comments:
Eclipse M6 was betting buggy, probably running out of memory. I tried to do a
save all, but it failed.

This NPE doesn't happen under normal shutdown. It was probably tried to dispose
the editor more than once.

Can you confirm that you had an OutOfMemoryException? Is this reproducible?

I cannot reproduce this bug, and i have increased the memory settings so this
must be an OutOfMemoryException breaking things. 

Ludovic

There's not much we can do in such a case. We can protect the code against the
unexpected NPE but nevertheless it will not be able to save your file.

See also bug 33972.
